Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Boris Johnson and Mike Pompeo expressed support for Nigerian separatists, as there is no public record or evidence of them making the comments attributed to them.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough supporting evidence to validate the statements attributed to Boris Johnson and Mike Pompeo.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Boris Johnson and Mike Pompeo expressed support for Nigerian separatists without any credible evidence or basis.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that numerous Facebook pages in support of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) have falsely attributed comments to global figures to further their cause.
